lead_paragraph: The sprinter Justin Gatlin will go before the Court of Arbitration for Sport on May 28-29 in New York to ask for a further reduction in a four-year doping suspension and so that he can defend his Olympic 100-meter title at the Beijing Games. The United States Olympic trials are set for June 27-July 6 in Eugene, Ore.
